titlestmt.author: Collection processed and described by Rebecca Pou

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Rebecca Pou, January 26, 2011

repository.corpname: New York Academy of Medicine Library. Rare Book Room.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: New York Odontological Society Records. Rare Book Room, New York Academy of Medicine Library.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The New York Odonotological Society, dedicated to the advancement and promotion of dentistry and oral surgery, was formed in 1867. Regular meetings, held on the third tuesday of the month, included papers, discussions, and other scientific and professional activities.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes minutes, annual reports, and the constitution, by-laws, and code of ethics of the Society, within three bound volumes and loose records. It also includes the deed of gift to the Bennett Osteological Collection, which is not held at the New York Academy of Medicine.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the catalog of The New York Academy of Medicine Library. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.

controlaccess.subject: Dentistry -- New York (State) -- New York -- Societies, etc.

did.unittitle: Bennett Osteological Collection Deed of Gift,
Constitution, By-laws, and Code of Ethics,

userestrict.p: Requests for permission to quote from or publish any materials should be directed to the curatorial staff of the Rare Book Room in writing.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: Collection includes gifts of Dr. A. Owre and Dr. R. M. Wollinson (through Dr. B. W. Weinberger/the First District Dental Society).
